com.codename1.components
Class ShareButton

java.lang.Object
  com.codename1.ui.Component
      com.codename1.ui.Label
          com.codename1.ui.Button
              com.codename1.components.ShareButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
Animation, ActionListener, StyleListener
public class ShareButton
extends Button
implements ActionListener

This is a share button. The share button is responsible to share the required info with the available sharing services
